queries.channels: SELECT DISTINCT channels.ensg, gating_mechanism, carried_solute, tissue FROM channels LEFT JOIN origin ON channels.ensg = origin.ensg;
queries.aquaporins: SELECT DISTINCT aquaporins.*, tissue FROM aquaporins LEFT JOIN origin ON aquaporins.ensg = origin.ensg;
queries.solute_carriers: SELECT DISTINCT solute_carriers.ensg, carried_solute, port_type, is_secondary, tissue FROM solute_carriers LEFT JOIN origin ON solute_carriers.ensg = origin.ensg;
queries.pumps: SELECT DISTINCT pumps.*, tissue FROM pumps LEFT JOIN origin ON pumps.ensg = origin.ensg;
queries.ABC: SELECT DISTINCT ABC_transporters.*, tissue FROM ABC_transporters LEFT JOIN origin ON ABC_transporters.ensg = origin.ensg;
